meanings.definition: The state of being exceptional or extraordinary.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and exceptional exceptionality made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The exceptionality of his talent was evident in every performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat's exceptionality in catching mice was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The exceptionality of the sunrise painted the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The exceptionality of the diamond's sparkle caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: An exceptional or extraordinary person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's exceptionality in saving lives inspired many.
meanings.sent2: The exceptionality of the rare flower attracted botanists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The dog's exceptionality in finding hidden treats was both surprising and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The exceptionality of her voice filled the room with pure emotion.
meanings.sent5: The exceptionality of the ancient artifact left archaeologists in awe.
